description: Simple, Classic and Luxurious Watchface for Android Wear Watch .Support both Round And Square Watches.If not Work than Re-install and if Application is not in List than open Android Wear Application on Mobile Tap Setting Icon and Resync Apps.If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at nilvavdiya@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it before rating.
descriptionHTML:
Simple, Classic and Luxurious Watchface for Android Wear Watch .
Support both Round And Square Watches.
If not Work than Re-install and if Application is not in List than
open Android Wear Application on Mobile Tap Setting Icon and Resync Apps.
If you find any bugs or you have any suggestions, please email me at nilvavdiya@gmail.com in order to correct or implement it before rating.
comments: Can't find it I've uninstalled and reinstalled this watch face. Also tried syncing in android wear app. What's the deal???

Looks great but needs customization Love the look and color of the gave on my Moto 360. Only wish you could customize the face with weather or something else. I don't need to know what Wi-Fi I'm on or my phone signal strength.
Doesn't update display Watch face good. Display name on face of watch customizable but unfortunatley, doesn't not remember when edited. Also, display battery % doesn't change.
Moto 360 I can't sync it with my watch. Unnecessary icon in the ago drawer
